text: (Kare wa rōgoku ni kite itta. ) `Yūsufu yo, seijitsuna hito yo, watashi-tachi ni hodoite kudasai. 7-Tō no koeta ushi o, 7-tō no 瘠Ta ushi ga tabe, mata 7tsu no midori no kokumotsu no ho to,-gai no (7tsu no) kareta mono to (no yume) o. Watashi wa hitobito no sho ni kaette, kare-ra ni rikai sa setai
